featured.text: Luckily they both escaped unharmed, but their boat was badly damaged and they had to abandon their journey.
A west-to-east journey, on the other hand, makes us late compared to the local time.
But, since our space journey started we have left so much trash there that scientists are now concerned that if we don’t clean it up, we may all be in mortal danger.
A person may suffer the most serious case of jet lag when he takes a __________ journey.
Unprepared for such a dangerous journey, many died of starvation and exposure to the cold weather.

definition.en_def: An act of traveling from one place to another.
definition.example: She embarked on a journey across Europe.
